markdownRemark.html:
REST Persons dto assignment

Author

üë§ Tobias Zimmermann

  • Github

API Documentation

üè† Project link

Base URL: https://api.tobias-z.com/rest-persons-dto

Person

GET /person/{id}
Description
Find person by id 
GET /person/
Description
Find all people

Required body for POST and PUT

{
      "firstName": string,
      "lastName": string,
      "phoneNumber": string,
      "address": {
          "street": string,
          "zip": string,
          "city": string
      }
}

POST /person/
Description
Create a new person 
PUT /person/{id}
Description
Updates an existing person by their id 
DELETE /person/{id}
Description
Delete a person by id

Responses

A single person:

{
      "id": int,
      "firstName": string,
      "lastName": string,
      "phoneNumber": string,
      "address": {
          "street": string,
          "zip": string,
          "city": string
      }
}

Multiple people:

{
    "all": [
        {
          "id": int,
          "firstName": string,
          "lastName": string,
          "phoneNumber": string,
          "address": {
              "street": string,
              "zip": string,
              "city": string
          }
        },
    ]
}

Error response:

{
      "code": int,
      "message": string
}

frontmatter.title: Rest persons DTO
frontmatter.description: This was my our first time creating a rest api which we would then use on the client side afterwards
